recipesJson.name: Bluegrass Custard
recipesJson.author: Freshepies
recipesJson.description:
Optional flavors:

FA Oak Barrel .25%

FA Marzipan .25-.5%

Sweet Coconut:  .25%

reviews.text: Thanks Fresh!, I'm on a huge Custard kick as of late, seen this and thought to my self..." Self you like custards and you like bourbon, mix it" so I did, Its ok off the shake but after a few days steep i'm sure it will be great,
